sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch } from 'react-router-dom';
import LayoutMain from '../pages/layouts/LayoutMain'
import LayoutAdmin from '../pages/layouts/LayoutAdmin'
//Admin
// import Dashboard from '../pages/views/Admin/DashBoard'
import Dashboard from '../pages/views/Admin/Dashboard'
import ProductsManager from '../pages/views/Admin/Products'
import AddProducts from '../pages/views/Admin/AddProducts'
import AboutAdmin from '../pages/views/Admin/AboutAdmin'
//Views
import About from '../pages/views/Main/About'
import Home from '../pages/views/Main/Home'


const Routers = ({ products, onRemove, onAdd }) => {
    const onHandleRemove = (id) => {
        onRemove(id)
    }
    const onHanleAdd = (id) => {
        onAdd(id)
    }
    return (
        <Router>
            <Switch>
                <Route path="/admin/:path?" exact>
                    <LayoutAdmin>
                        <Switch>
                            <Route path='/admin' exact>
                                <Dashboard />
                            </Route>
                            {/* <Route path='/admin/products'>
                                <ProductsManager products={products} onAdd={onHanleAdd} />
                            </Route> */}
                            <Route path='/admin/Products'>
                                <ProductsManager products={products} onRemove={onHandleRemove} />
                            </Route>
                            <Route path='admin/product/add'
                                render={(props) =>
                                    <AddProduct {...props} onAdd={onAdd} />}></Route>
                            <Route path='/admin/:id'>
                                <AboutAdmin products={products} />
                            </Route>
                        </Switch>
                    </LayoutAdmin>
                </Route>
                <Route>
                    <LayoutMain>
                        <Switch>
                            <Route path="/" exact>
                                <Home />
                            </Route>
                            <Route path="/about">
                                <About />
                            </Route>
                        </Switch>
                    </LayoutMain>
                </Route>
            </Switch>
        </Router >
    )
}
Routers.propTypes = {
}
export default Routers
